verses.name: 1 Samuel 20:15
verses.text: But also thou shalt not cut off thy kindness from my house for ever: no, not when the Lord hath cut off the enemies of David every one from the face of the earth.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 20:16
verses.text: So Jonathan made a covenant with the house of David, saying, Let the Lord even require it at the hand of David’s enemies.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 20:17
verses.text: And Jonathan caused David to swear again, because he loved him: for he loved him as he loved his own soul.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 20:18
verses.text: Then Jonathan said to David, To morrow is the new moon: and thou shalt be missed, because thy seat will be empty.
